column5: Anyone have any word on the ice conditions around the Ottawa Valley?

Folks are fishing the bays around Petrie Island, I would avoid venturing out further for a while yet. Same with Shirleys bay, I would avoid the current edge but there is good ice in the bay. The Rideau has good ice, same thing, be wary of the current areas. The Head Pond has guys out fishing along the points and in both  the launch bay areas. All back lakes are good to go.
